title: Game-Based Language Learning Design Workshop: Expert Discussions for Managerial Leadership Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories and general understanding of game elements (levels, rewards, etc.)
context.additional_context: A program for managers/leaders aiming to improve corporate language education, focusing on deriving gamification strategies through real-case analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can design at least one language education scenario using a game-based learning design framework.
Learners can explain at least three ways to link game mechanics with language learning objectives based on expert panel discussions.
Learners can propose game element improvements incorporating peer feedback through formative assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
